name: Lipstick Assassin
description:
Lipstick Assassin is a Pulp, Sci-Fi, Action, Glam, RPG. An action packed spy world of the future.

Agent : Beamera Zanotti (code name : LIPSTICK ASSASSIN), specialty Extraterrestrial Technologies.

Her Mission : Collect the Gold Auric Fields and eliminate toxic extraterrestrials. Work way through the portal doors in search of "The Great Stash". Maneuver, & outsmart enemies. Eliminate enemies with weapons when necessary. All while avoiding deadly explosions. Reach the Executive Level through the portal doors. Reach and collect "The Great Stash" of Gold Auric Fields and complete the mission.

Operation : Auric Fields
